PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss.synopsis: In Shar temple HQ player approaches shuttered Mirror of Loss and rolls arcana check

AD_ShutteredMirrorOfLoss.synopsis: Narrator AD on Shattered Mirror of Loss in Shar's temple in Act 2

PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_0.text: There was magic within this mirror once... consuming magic. But it's shattered, now.
PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Played when Medicine check succeeds.NodeContext: Shadowheart: deja vu/slightly unnerved (looking at a broken magical mirror, similar to one that took her memories previously)

PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_1.text: Must have been quite a mirror, before it was smashed.
PAD_BrokenMirrorOfLoss_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Played when Medicine check fails.

AD_ShutteredMirrorOfLoss_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShutteredMirrorOfLoss_0.text: *Gazing into the broken mirror serves no purpose. The reflection it offers is like a dizzying kaleidoscope.*

AD_ShutteredMirrorOfLoss_1.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShutteredMirrorOfLoss_1.text: *The mirror is shattered and beyond any use.*
